title: Blackened Trout
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon paprika', '2 teaspoons mustard powder', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon salt', '170g unsalted butter, melted', '6 (115g) fillets trout', '50g unsalted butter, melted']
